test.query: SELECT * FROM numbers_mt(100) AS l RIGHT JOIN numbers_mt(10000000) AS r USING (number)
SELECT * FROM numbers_mt(100) AS l FULL JOIN numbers_mt(10000000) AS r USING (number)
SELECT * FROM numbers_mt(10000000) AS l RIGHT JOIN numbers_mt(10000000) AS r USING (number)
SELECT * FROM numbers_mt(10000000) AS l FULL JOIN numbers_mt(10000000) AS r USING (number)
